name: LogicaImplementationGuideCovid19
title: Logica Implementation Guide: Covid-19
description: The COVID-19 IG describes structured data to be collected and communicated between providers and aggregators.

resource.name: Coded Laboratory Observation Base
resource.description: Abstract base class for coded laboratory observations.

resource.name: Human coronavirus 229E RNA [Presence] in Nasopharynx by NAA with non-probe detection
resource.description: Humancoronavirus229ERNAPrThrPtNphOrdNonprobeamptarLabObs is a test for the Human coronavirus 229E nucleaic acid in nasopharynx specimens via non-probe, target amplification method.

resource.name: Human coronavirus HKU1 RNA [Presence] in Nasopharynx by NAA with non-probe detection
resource.description: HumancoronavirusHKU1RNAPrThrPtNphOrdNonprobeamptarLabObs is a test for the Human coronavirus HKU1 nucleaic acid in nasopharynx specimens via non-probe, target amplification method.

resource.name: Human coronavirus NL63 RNA [Presence] in Nasopharynx by NAA with non-probe detection
resource.description: HumancoronavirusNL63RNAPrThrPtNphOrdNonprobeamptarLabObs is a test for the Human coronavirus NL63 nucleaic acid in nasopharynx specimens via non-probe, target amplification method.

resource.name: Human coronavirus OC43 RNA [Presence] in Nasopharynx by NAA with non-probe detection
resource.description: HumancoronavirusOC43RNAPrThrPtNphOrdNonprobeamptarLabObs is a test for the Human coronavirus OC43 nucleaic acid in nasopharynx specimens via non-probe, target amplification method.

resource.name: Laboratory Observation Base
resource.description: Abstract base class for laboratory observations.

resource.name: Laboratory Observation Panel Base
resource.description: A panel that contains member observations

resource.name: Quantitative Laboratory Observation Base
resource.description: Abstract base class for quantitative laboratory observations.

resource.name: SARS coronavirus 2 Ag [Presence] in Respiratory specimen by Rapid immunoassay
resource.description: SARSCoV2AgRespQlIArapidLabObs is a test for the SARS coronavirus 2 antigen via rapid immunoassay. LOINC code 94558-4.

resource.name: SARS coronavirus 2 N gene [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by Nucleic acid amplification using primer-probe set N1
resource.description: SARScoronavirus2NgenePrThrPtXXXOrdPrbAmpTarPrimerProbeSetN1 is a test for the SARS coronavirus 2 RNA using the CDC defined method of probe amplification target primer probe set N1 and used for non-respiratory specimens. LOINC code 94307-6.

resource.name: SARS coronavirus 2 N gene [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by Nucleic acid amplification using primer-probe set N2
resource.description: SARScoronavirus2NgenePrThrPtXXXOrdPrbAmpTarPrimerProbeSetN2 is a test for the SARS coronavirus 2 RNA using the CDC defined method of probe amplification target primer probe set N2 and used for non-respiratory specimens. LOINC code 94308-4.

resource.name: SARS coronavirus 2 N gene [Cycle Threshold #] in Unspecified specimen by Nucleic acid amplification using primer-probe set N1
resource.description: SARSCoV2NgeneThreshNumPtXXXQnPrbAmpTarPrimerProbeSetN1LabObs is a quantitative test for the SARS coronavirus 2 N gene via the probe target amplification, primer probe set N1 method in non-respiratory specimens. LOINC code 94311-8.

resource.name: SARS coronavirus 2 N gene [Cycle Threshold #] in Unspecified specimen by Nucleic acid amplification using primer-probe set N2
resource.description: SARSCoV2NgeneThreshNumPtXXXQnPrbAmpTarPrimerProbeSetN2LabObs is a quantitative test for the SARS coronavirus 2 N gene via the probe target amplification, primer probe set N2 method in non-respiratory specimens. LOINC code 94312-6.

resource.name: SARS coronavirus 2 ORF1ab region [Presence] in Respiratory specimen by NAA with probe detection
resource.description: SARSCoV2ORF1abRespQlNAAprobeLabObs is a laboratory test for the SARS coronavirus 2 antibody via target amplification probe detection. LOINC code 94559-2.

resource.name: SARS coronavirus 2 RNA panel - Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
resource.description: SARSCoV2RNAPnlXXXNAAprobeLabObs is a colection of tests for the SARS coronavirus 2 organism. LOINC code 94306-8.

resource.name: SARS-like coronavirus N gene [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
resource.description: SARSLikecoronavirusNGenePrThrPtXXXOrdPrbAmpTarLabObs is a test for the SARS-like coronavirus N gene in non-respiratory specimens and via the probe target amplification method. LOINC code 94310-0.

resource.name: SARS-like coronavirus N gene [Cycle Threshold #] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
resource.description: SARSLikecoronavirusNGeneThreshNumPtXXXQnPrbAmpTarLabObs is a quantitative test for the SARS-like coronavirus N gene via the probe target amplification method and a threshold for detection in non-respiratory specimens. LOINC code 94313-4.

resource.name: SARS-related coronavirus RNA [Presence] in Respiratory specimen by NAA with probe detection
resource.description: SARSRelatedCoronavirusRNAPrThrPtRespOrdPrbAmpTar is a test for the SARS coronavirus 2 related RNA (gene not specified). LOINC code 94502-2.

resource.name: SARS coronavirus 2 IgA Ab [Presence] in Serum or Plasma by Immunoassay
resource.description: SARScoronavirus2AbIgAPrThrPtSerPlasOrdIALabObs is a qualitative test for the SARS coronavirus 2 IgA antibody in serum or plasma via immunoassay.

resource.name: SARS coronavirus 2 IgG Ab [Units/volume] in Serum or Plasma by Immunoassay
resource.description: SARScoronavirus2AbIgGAcncPtSerPlasQnIALabObs is a quantitative test for the SARS coronavirus 2 IgG antibody via immunoassay. LOINC code 94505-5.

resource.name: SARS coronavirus 2 IgG+IgM Ab [Presence] in Serum or Plasma by Immunoassay
resource.description: SARScoronavirus2AbIgGPlusIgMPrThrPtSerPlasOrdIALabObs is a test for the SARS coronavirus 2 IgG and IgM antibodies via immunoassay. It does not differentiate which is detected. LOINC code 94547-7.

resource.name: SARS coronavirus 2 IgG Ab [Presence] in Serum or Plasma by Immunoassay
resource.description: SARScoronavirus2AbIgGPrThrPtSerPlasOrdIALabObs is a qualitative test for the SARS coronavirus 2 IgG antibody via immunoassay.

resource.name: SARS coronavirus 2 IgG and IgM panel - Serum or Plasma Qualitative by Rapid immunoassay
resource.description: SARS coronavirus 2 IgG and IgM panel - Serum or Plasma Qualitative by Rapid immunoassay

resource.name: SARS coronavirus 2 IgG and IgM panel - Serum or Plasma by Immunoassay
resource.description: SARScoronavirus2AbIgGandIgMpanelPtSerPlasQnIALabObs is a collection of quantitative tests for SARS coronavirus 2 antibodies, IgG and IgM. LOINC code 94504-8.

resource.name: SARS coronavirus 2 IgM Ab [Units/volume] in Serum or Plasma by Immunoassay
resource.description: SARScoronavirus2AbIgMAcncPtSerPlasQnIALabObs is a quantitative test for the SARS coronavirus 2 IgM antibody via immunoassay. LOINC code 94506-3.

resource.name: SARS coronavirus 2 IgM Ab [Presence] in Serum or Plasma by Immunoassay
resource.description: SARScoronavirus2AbIgMPrThrPtSerPlasOrdIALabObs is a test for the SARS coronavirus 2 IgM antibody in serum or plasma via immunoassay.

resource.name: SARS coronavirus 2 IgM Ab [Presence] in Serum or Plasma by Rapid immunoassay
resource.description: SARScoronavirus2AbIgMPrThrPtSerPlasOrdIArapidLabObs is a test for the SARS coronavisus 2 IgM antibody via rapid immunoassay. LOINC code 94508-9.

resource.name: SARS coronavirus 2 E gene [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
resource.description: SARScoronavirus2EGenePrThrPtXXXOrdPrbAmpTarLabObs is a test for the SARS coronavirus 2 E gene on non-respiratory specimens via the probe target amplification method in non-respiratory specimens. LOINC code 94315-9.

resource.name: SARS coronavirus 2 E gene [Cycle Threshold #] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
resource.description: SARScoronavirus2EGeneThreshNumPtXXXQnPrbAmpTarLabObs is a quantitative test for the SARS coronavirus 2 E gene via probe target ampification and with a threshold for detection in non-respiratory specimens. LOINC code 94509-7.

resource.name: SARS coronavirus 2 N gene [Presence] in Respiratory specimen by NAA with probe detection
resource.description: SARScoronavirus2NGenePrThrPtRespOrdPrbAmpTar is the qualitative lab test for the detection of the SARS Coronavirus 2 N gene. LOINC code 94533-7.

resource.name: SARS coronavirus 2 N gene [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
resource.description: SARScoronavirus2NgenePrThrPtXXXOrdPrbAmpTar is a test for the SARS coronavirus 2 RNA in non-respiratory specimens. LOINC code 94316-7.

resource.name: SARS coronavirus 2 N gene [Cycle Threshold #] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
resource.description: SARScoronavirus2NgeneThreshNumPtXXXQnPrbAmpTarLabObs is a quantitative test for the SARS coronavirus 2 RNA via probe target amplification and a requirement for a certain threshold for detection. LOINC code 94510-5.

resource.name: SARS coronavirus 2 ORF1ab region [Cycle Threshold #] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
resource.description: SARScoronavirus2ORF1AbRegionThreshNumPtXXXQnPrbAmpTarLabObs is a quantitative test for the SARS coronavirus 2 ORF Ab region via the probe target ampificatio method and with a threshold for detection in non-respiratory specimens. LOINC code 94511-3

resource.name: SARS coronavirus 2 RNA panel - Respiratory specimen by NAA with probe detection
resource.description: SARScoronavirus2RNAPanelPtRespPrbAmpTar is a collection of tests for the SARS coronavirus 2 RNA. LOINC code 94531-1.

resource.name: SARS coronavirus 2 RNA [Presence] in Nasopharynx by NAA with non-probe detection
resource.description: SARScoronavirus2RNAPrThrPtNphOrdNonprobeamptarLabObs is a test for SARS coronavirus 2 RNA nucleaic acids in nasopharynx specimens via non-probe, target amplification method.

resource.name: SARS coronavirus 2 RNA [Presence] in Respiratory specimen by NAA with probe detection
resource.description: SARScoronavirus2RNAPrThrPtRespOrdPrbAmpTar is the laboratory model for the SARS Coronavirus 2 specific for RNA, respiratory specimens, method of probe, target amplification. LOINC code 94500-6.

resource.name: SARS coronavirus 2 RNA [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
resource.description: SARScoronavirus2RNAPrThrXXXOrdPrbAmpTar is the laboratory model for the SARS Coronavirus 2 specific for RNA and method of probe, target amplification but not specific to specimen type. LOINC code 94309-2.

resource.name: SARS coronavirus 2 RdRp gene [Presence] in Respiratory specimen by NAA with probe detection
resource.description: SARScoronavirus2RdRpGenePrThePtRespOrdPrbAmpTar is a test for the SARS coronavirus 2 RdRp gene in respiratory specimens. LOINC code 94534-5.

resource.name: SARS coronavirus 2 RdRp gene [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
resource.description: SARScoronavirus2RdRpGenePrThrPtXXXOrdPrbAmpTarLabObs is a test for the SARS coronavirus 2 RdRp gene via the probe target amplification method in non-respiratory specimens. LOINC code 94314-2.

resource.name: SARS-related coronavirus+MERS coronavirus RNA [Presence] in Respiratory specimen by NAA with probe detection
resource.description: SARSrelatedcoronavirusPlusMERScoronavirusRNAPrThrPtRespOrdPrbAmpTar is a combined test for SARS coronavirus 2 RNA (not gene specific) and MERS coronavirus RNA. LOINC code 94532-9.

resource.name: Reporting Priority
resource.description: The urgency level for which an observation must be reported.

resource.name: Detected-Not Detected-Equivalent-Inconclusive Value Set
resource.description: A set of SNOMED codes representing the result of a test as detected, not detected, equivalent, or inconclusive.

resource.name: Positive/Negative Value Set
resource.description: A set of SNOMED codes representing the result of a test as positive or negative.

resource.name: Reporting Priorities Value Set
resource.description: A set of SNOMED codes representing how important it is to report a lab or other observation.
